1.name: Blood Pool
1.details:
When Blood kills an enemy with any of his abilities, he increases his maximum health permanently. Large minions and monsters will double the maximum health increase and enemy Hero will quadruple the maximum health increase.

Blood uses his health to cast abilities instead of mana.

2.name: Blood Drain
2.details:
In sword mode, Blood stabs in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and healing himself (scaling with magical power), based on the amount of enemies hit.

In staff mode, Blood drains the blood from a target enemy Hero, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) over a short duration and heals himself (scaling with magical power) over the same duration.

In addition, Blood also gains increased movement speed during the drain.

3.name: Blood Sword / Blood Staff
3.details:
Blood shapeshifts his weapon into either a sword or a staff, gaining different abilities.

When switching to a sword, his basic attack has shorter range but deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power). Moreover, his first basic attack within a short while after shapeshifting will greatly slow the target for a very short duration.

When switching to a staff, his basic attack gains additional range. Moreover, his first basic attack within a short while after shapeshifting deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) and reduces the targetâ€™s magic resistance for a short duration.

4.name: Death Grasp
4.details:
In sword mode, Blood dashes in a target direction and sends out a claw, briefly pulling the first enemy hit to him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

In staff mode, Blood summons a claw in a target direction, pulling all enemies within the path towards him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

5.name: Night Feast
5.details:
In Sword mode, Blood briefly channels then sends out a number of Blood Bat over a few seconds. Each Blood Bat will fly to a nearby enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and heals himself (scaling with magical power).

In Staff mode, Blood briefly channels then sends out a number of Blood Bats over a few seconds. Each Blood Bat will fly to a nearby enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies and fearing them for a short duration.

Blood Bat will prioritise enemy Hero and closer enemy. The number of Blood Bats will increase based on this ability’s level.
